column4: I think compiz and beryl combined to make compiz fusion, so there are packages from both projects
wait what os u on?
ubuntu 8.04
do a sudo apt-get install compizconfig-settings-manage
and i know i dont have no dang 3d cube like my first install
ok
Because fusion comes packaged with hardy .. you just have to enable the control for it by sudo apt-get install compizconfig-settings-manager
ah... i see um it says couldn't find package. i'll check if i added a space from copy and past :D i know i am lazy
at the end did you copy the manage or manager?
if its in apt-get wont it be in the package manager thingy?
yes not suppose to?
It should have the r at the end
wow that makes me feel dumb ty mate
thankyou i now got the one function i've been wanting my 3d cube
cool, be sure to enable cube caps and set images for those so the cube at the top and bottom isn't plain
you mean you can fix that? wow my first install i just learned to ignore it.
Yes you can even set hotkeys to scroll through several differnt image options while your moving the cube
um i got an image on top but none on bottom why??
Did you set which images to load for cube caps?
yes.
I wasn't getting any images with mine so I had to add the image path for both
Maybe the bottom image is linked to a non existent file
or one without read permissions...
i dont know.. i even tried two images think it is back ground image? some how? seeing how skydome seems to be that.
